content: this pattern is for a crocheted project basket/bag which you can fold down when in use it has handles which makes it easy to carry along different yarn weights will result in a bigger or smaller bag gauge is not important but you might consider using a smaller crochet hook for the yarn you re using than normal as you are aiming for a denser crocheted item to give more stability and shape to the bag you will need about 200 - 300 g of yarn depending on the weight of the yarn and the size you want your finished bag this is a perfect project to use leftover yarn from other projects
